text: Hello there! Can you tell me something about fish?
Indeed, fish often live in aquatous environments. Can you now tell me something about birds?
Oh, you don't seem to know much about fish... Can you maybe tell me something about birds?
Indeed, birds often fly freely in the sky, far away from the ground. Well done!
Indeed, birds lay eggs in a nest. They then wait for the eggs to hatch, and new birds are born. Well done!
Oh, you don't seem to know much about birds... Anyway, you tried!
